publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4006.1 Alex Johnstone: The Economyâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-4006) in the name of Liam McArthur, leave out from "notes that current" to end and insert "and calls on the Scottish Government to report back to the Parliament on the extent to which a fuel duty derogation for rural areas would be permissible under EU law and what impact such a derogation would have on carbon emissions and the Scottish budget."
